title: Episode 44: The Lady of the Lake (LIVE AT THE DALLAS COMEDY FESTIVAL)
description:
This episode was recorded live at the 2019 Dallas Comedy Festival!One of Dallas’s most beautiful features, this 1000 acre oasis in the middle of a bustling town is a calm retreat for some residents, but for over a century, others have encountered something more chilling. Are the dark side roads in East Dallas home to a persistent specter, or is this just another tall Texas tale?
_This episode was recorded live at the 2019 Dallas Comedy Festival! _
Support Sinisterhood
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
